text: @WhiteHouse On #fathersday2020 2.32 million confirmed #coronavirus cases on top of at least 122,000 American deaths under the politics-first ‘leadership’ of @VP Pence & @realDonaldTrump still ignoring science-based experts...but patting themselves on the back for a job well done #COVIDIOTS https://t.co/A57SB1yaig
